summary: Quiz competition app for Hodhod store with 4 multiple-choice questions (country flags, sports, intelligence/math, science/technology), 12-second time limit per question, game over on wrong answer with correct answer displayed, randomized question selection
architectural_notes: 4 sequential questions, one from each category
Instant game termination on incorrect answer
Visual feedback system: green for correct answers, red for incorrect answers
Audio feedback: celebratory sound on correct answer, regretful sound on incorrect answer
12-second countdown timer per question (increased from 7 seconds)
Display correct answer when game ends due to incorrect answer
Random question selection from available question pools
known_issues: Incorrect question-answer mappings need verification and correction

existing_features.title: Create a quiz game structure with exactly 4 sequential questions, one from each category: country flags, sports, intelligence/math, and science/technology
Implement a 7-second countdown timer for each question that automatically ends the game if time expires
Implement immediate game over with 'You Lost' message when user selects wrong answer or fails to answer within time limit
Display country flag images for category 1 questions as visual prompts with 4 text-based country name options

Create a UI with warm, energetic design featuring vibrant orange and yellow tones inspired by Middle Eastern market aesthetics, with bold typography for questions and clear visual hierarchy for the quiz interface

Convert all user-facing text in the frontend to Persian (Farsi), including welcome screen title and descriptions, question text and answer options for all four categories, timer labels, game over messages, victory messages, button labels, and category badges
Add exciting, thrilling background music that loops continuously throughout the quiz game experience, playing during question displays and continuing across all game states
Expand the question pool with significantly more questions for all four categories (country flags, sports, intelligence/math, science/technology) to provide more variety and reduce repetition

Add visual feedback when user selects an answer: display green color/indicator for correct answers and red color/indicator for incorrect answers before transitioning to next question or game over screen
Replace the current background music with a more exciting, thrilling music track that plays continuously throughout the quiz game
Add a celebratory, encouraging sound effect that plays when the user selects the correct answer
Add a regretful, disappointing sound effect that plays when the user selects an incorrect answer
Display the correct answer option on the game over screen when the user loses by selecting a wrong answer or running out of time
Increase the countdown timer duration from 7 seconds to 12 seconds per question
Update the welcome screen text to reflect the new 12-second time limit instead of 7 seconds
